verses.kjv: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.ct: From Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy — to the church of the Thessalonians, united with God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:

verses.kjv: Grace unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: May grace and peace come to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth;
verses.ct: Brothers, we always feel compelled to thank God for you, and rightly so, because your faith is growing tremendously, and the love each one of you has for one another keeps increasing.

verses.kjv: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure:
verses.ct: Because of this, we proudly speak about you among the other churches of God — about your endurance and faith through all the persecution and hardships you are going through.

verses.kjv: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God, that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:
verses.ct: This is clear evidence of God's righteous judgment, showing that you will be considered worthy of the kingdom of God, which is exactly what you are suffering for.

verses.kjv: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you;
verses.ct: After all, it is right for God to pay back with suffering those who cause you to suffer,

verses.kjv: And to you who are troubled rest with us, when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels,
verses.ct: and to give relief to you who are suffering, along with us. This will happen when the Lord Jesus appears from heaven with his powerful angels,

verses.kjv: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God, and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.ct: in blazing fire, bringing justice against those who don't know God and those who refuse to follow the good news of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;
verses.ct: They will face the penalty of eternal destruction, shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his power,

verses.kjv: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.
verses.ct: on the day when he comes to be honored among his holy people and marveled at by everyone who believed — and that includes you, because you accepted the message we brought you.

verses.kjv: Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy of this calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness, and the work of faith with power:
verses.ct: That is why we constantly pray for you, asking that our God would consider you worthy of his calling, and that by his power he would bring to completion every good desire and every act of faith,

verses.kjv: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: so that the name of our Lord Jesus Christ would be honored through you, and you through him, in keeping with the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
